spellcasting.name: Llançament de conjurs Innat
headerEntries: The anchorite's innate spellcasting ability is Wisdom (spell save {@dc 12}). It pot llançar els conjurs següents innatament (no requereix components materials):

trait.name: Shapechanger
entries: The anchorite can use its action to polymorph into a boar or back into its true form, which is humanoid. Its statistics are the same in each form. Any equipment it is wearing or carrying isn't transformed. It reverts to its true form if it dies.

action.name: Clawed Gauntlet (Humanoid Form Only)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}5 ({@damage 1d4 + 3}) de dany tallant.

action.name: Tusk (Boar Form Only)
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 5} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d6 + 3}) de dany tallant.

trait.name: Brave
entries: Don-Jon has advantage on saving throws against being {@condition frightened}.

trait.name: Not Dead Yet (Recharges after a Long Rest)
entries: If damage reduces Don-Jon to 0 hit points, he drops to 1 hit point instead and gains advantage on attack rolls until the end of his next turn.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: Don-Jon makes three melee attacks.

action.name: Dagger
entries: {@atk mw,rw} {@hit 2} a impactar, abast 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., un objectiu. {@h}2 ({@damage 1d4}) de dany perforant.

action.name: Sling
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 2} a impactar, range 30/120 ft., un objectiu. {@h}2 ({@damage 1d4}) de dany contundent.

trait.name: Archer
entries: A longbow or shortbow deals one extra die of its damage when Falcon hits with it (included in his longbow attack).

trait.name: Sharpshooter
entries: Falcon's ranged weapon attacks ignore half cover and three-quarters cover.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: Falcon makes three melee attacks or two ranged attacks.

action.name: Longsword
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 4} a impactar, 5 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}6 ({@damage 1d8 + 2}) de dany tallant, or 7 ({@damage 1d10 + 2}) de dany tallant if used with two hands.

action.name: Longbow
entries: {@atk rw} {@hit 4} a impactar, range 150/600 ft., un objectiu. {@h}11 ({@damage 2d8 + 2}) de dany perforant.

trait.name: Relentless (es Recarrega amb un descans Curt o Llarg)
entries: If Gorthok takes 27 damage or less that would reduce it to 0 hit points, it is reduced to 1 hit point instead.

action.name: Multi-atac
entries: Gorthok makes two melee attacks: one with its lightning tusks and one with its thunder hooves.

action.name: Lightning Tusks
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}12 ({@damage 2d6 + 5}) de dany tallant plus 7 ({@damage 2d6}) de dany elèctric.

action.name: Thunder Hooves
entries: {@atk mw} {@hit 8} a impactar, 10 peus d'abast, un objectiu. {@h}12 ({@damage 2d6 + 5}) de dany contundent plus 7 ({@damage 2d6}) de dany de tro.

action.name: Lightning Bolt {@recharge}
entries: Gorthok shoots a bolt of lightning at one creature it can see within 120 feet of it. The target must make a {@dc 15} Dexterity saving throw, taking 18 ({@damage 4d8}) de dany elèctric on a failed save, ; si supera, en rep la meitat.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The gnome is a 2nd-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save {@dc 12}, {@hit 4} a impactar with spell attacks). It has the following wizard spells prepared:

trait.name: Gnome Cunning
entries: The gnome has advantage on Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma saving throws against magic.

action.name: Magic Missile (Expends a 1st-Level Spell Slot)
entries: The gnome creates three magical darts. Each dart hits a creature the gnome chooses within 120 feet of it and deals 3 ({@damage 1d4 + 1}) de dany de força.

action.name: Ray of Frost
entries: {@atk rs} {@hit 4} a impactar, 60 peus d'abast, una criatura. {@h}4 ({@damage 1d8}) de dany de fred, and the target's speed is reduced by 10 feet until the start of the gnome's next turn.
